name: HEXADIA
description:
HEXADIA is a hexagonal photo puzzle game. Become a master at assembling puzzle pieces together. Put all hexagons to correct Angle / Position and discover beautiful photo. Use Rotate / Swap / Time buttons to make puzzle easier. Fight the time and get the highest score.

  • 37 puzzles, 4 levels with 8 / 23 / 46 / 86 pieces
  • gameplay: click to rotate and drag to another position
  • puzzle score and global score
  • music and sound jingles, vizual particle effects
  • 6+ hours of playing to solve all puzzles

More games: http://llstd.com
